com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities

Class FileView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities.FileView

  • public final class FileView
extends Activity
    Activity to display the files in the application internal files directory. Used mainly for debugging.
